name: FEVER GOLF
description:
1. W-A-S-D TO MOVE, CLICK TO FIRE GOLF BALL.

2. GOLF BALLS MAY ONLY BE FIRED WHEN YOU ARE NEAR A FLAG. 

3. EXPIRED GOLF BALLS CREATE NEW FLAGS.

4. GET BALL INTO HOLE TO PROGRESS. 

5. ENJOY THIS BRIEF INTERLUDE IN DREAM TIME. 

This is a game about early 2000s bargain bin CD culture, that is, games that few people played & fewer remember.  They were the last few digital artifacts that were allowed to fall into the quiet oblivion of history—the rear guard of an older era that pre-existed our current climate of  perpetual distribution.  This is a game for the MySimAquariam and MoonTycoons of the world; bottom-shelf junk-ware with a soul. 

Have fun exploring the HellWorld of FEVERGOLF,

-OleanderGarden

(P.s, if you, for some strange reason, are interested in seeing my films/music/other-garbage, you can find it on https://oleandergarden.neocities.org/ —website still W.I.P.)

Music used under CC Attribution, created by https://soundcloud.com/beardmont
